short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add rounded corners border to your Youtube video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add a rounded corner to your Youtube Video, make it the same as others cards on Youtube. You will have an option to turn on or off this extension.
